author: Staff Reporter
text:
Some unidentified persons allegedly stolen a television set, 50 kg rice and Rs. 3,000 in cash from a shop at Ramiapalayam here.

According to police officials at Cheyur police station where a case was registered in this connection, the accused gained entry into the shop floor by breaking open the shutter lock on Thursday night.

Arrested

The Amaravathinagar police arrested M. Samidurai (37) on the charge of stealing coconuts from a farm at Elamuthur on Thursday.
title: Shop burgled
